short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to summarize web content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReadSmart: Harness the Power of Language Models for Web Browsing

Maximize Your Web Experience:

ReadSmart is a revolutionary Chrome extension that transforms your web browsing experience by leveraging the capabilities of advanced language models. With just one click on the extension's sidebar button, ReadSmart intelligently summarizes the textual content of any webpage you're visiting. This powerful feature enables you to grasp the essence of web pages instantly, especially those dense in text, like news sites and blogs.

Why Choose ReadSmart?

Efficient Browsing: ReadSmart drastically increases your browsing efficiency, allowing you to absorb key points and summaries without spending hours reading.
User-Friendly Interface: Easily access summaries with a simple click, integrating seamlessly into your browsing routine.
History Tracking: Not only can you get instant summaries, but ReadSmart also allows you to view and manage summaries of previously visited webpages or articles.
Tailored for Content-Rich Sites: Particularly beneficial for websites rich in text, ReadSmart distills lengthy articles, news stories, and blog posts into concise, digestible summaries.
